plan_steps: 1) Use mobile-first digital messaging emphasizing affordable protection and easy online enrollment for young professionals. [Doc#1]
2) Initiate with instant online quote, send educational content day 3, offer live chat support day 7, and provide limited-time discount at day 14. [Doc#4]
3) Address price concerns by demonstrating coverage value, offer trial period with money-back guarantee, and provide competitor comparison showing superior benefits. [Doc#3]
1) Focus on family protection messaging with income replacement scenarios and coverage for dependents' future needs. [Doc#1]
2) Schedule agent consultation within 24 hours, follow up with personalized email next day, and maintain weekly touchpoints. [Doc#4]
3) Address price concerns by demonstrating coverage value, offer trial period with money-back guarantee, and provide competitor comparison showing superior benefits. [Doc#2]
